nodes.text: CT-9521, nicknamed "Pulsar," was a clone trooper sergeant who served in Tango Company during the Clone Wars.

Pulsar, along with the rest of Tango Company served on Geonosis, was afterward sent on a medical supply run to Ord Cestus. While aboard a Republic supply ship that was being transported back to Republic space by Jedi Commanders Ahsoka Tano and Barriss Offee, he along with the rest of the crew were infected by Geonosian brain worms. But Pulsar along with the rest of the crew were finally sterilized when Ahsoka ruptured the cooling tanks of the TB-73.

Pulsar carried a DC-15S carbine, he was also featured wearing a back pack. He wore Phase I Armor that had blue markings and bore a striped sigil on his armored shoulder plates that resembled a stylized tiger face.
